programme.title: The Ninth Configuration
programme.desc: A military psychiatrist takes charge of an army mental hospital situated in a secluded castle filled with eccentric patients.

programme.title: Sawbones
programme.desc: An edgy, terrifying tale about an intern who failed medical school... but never gave up surgery.

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation
programme.desc: On the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and her father's disappearance, Heather discovers she is not who she thinks she is.

programme.title: Day of the Dead [VHS Vault]
programme.desc: A small group of scientists and soldiers struggle to control the flesh-eating horror that walks the earth above.

programme.title: Frankenstein: Part 1
programme.desc: A creature constructed from the limbs of the dead vows revenge against Victor Frankenstein, the scientist who created him.

programme.title: Frankenstein: Part 2
programme.desc: A creature constructed from the limbs of the dead vows revenge against Victor Frankenstein, the scientist who created him.

programme.title: MST3K: Munchie
programme.desc: Jonah's crew watch as a child befriends MUNCHIE (1992). Jonah refuses to go back into the theater and suffers the consequences.

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf (English Language Version)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend investigate killings by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Howling VI: The Freaks
programme.desc: A villainous carnival owner traps a young werewolf to include in his growing menagerie of inhuman exhibits.

programme.title: Funeral Home
programme.desc: A young woman turns her Grandmother's house into a B&B. Shortly after, guests wind up missing or dead.

programme.title: Wishcraft
programme.desc: Bret eceives a strange box in the mail. A note tells him it will give him three wishes, but just as his new life is beginning, someone is murdering the popular kids in strange, inventive ways.

programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: Black Sunday [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Devil's Wedding Night
programme.desc: A quest for the mythical Ring of Vermougglian leads the Schiller brothers to Transylvania and Castle Dracula.
